Package br.dev.rplus.cup.utils

Class StringUtils

java.lang.Object
br.dev.rplus.cup.utils.StringUtils
public class StringUtils extends Object
Utility class for common operations on strings, including manipulation, conversion, and validation.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to pad.
      length - the desired length.
      padChar - the character to use for padding.
      padLeft - true to pad on the left, false to pad on the right.
      Returns:
      the padded string.
